'''1.4.1''' was a server version of [[Java Edition Classic]] released for client version [[Classic 0.0.18a_02|0.0.18a_02]] on June 14, 2009,<ref name="blog">{{tumblr|Notch|123373844|There's a minor server patch up|June 14, 2009}}</ref> at 12:15 UTC.<ref>[https://archive.org/download/Minecraft_IRC_Logs_2009/DBN-IRC-Logs/ IRC logs] on Archive.org; #minecraft.20090614.log. June 14, 2009 (UTC&minus;5). "''A7:15:06 <Notch> there's a new minecraft-server.zip now''" (12:15:06 UTC)</ref>

== Fixes ==
* Fixed bad names connecting and crashing all players.<ref name="blog"/>
